title: Did the FBI warn of armed protests in "all 50 government capitols "?
subtitle: A number of potential threats of violence planned in the days prior to the opening of Joe Biden on 20 January 2021 were brought to the attention of Congress.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The FBI warned officials about armed demonstrations planned in all 50 counties and the American Capitol for the days before Joe Biden was inaugurated.
